name: No Man's Ground
description:
(CAUTION: Players may experience motion sickness, you have been warned)

Play the deathmatch you know and love, in 100% Zero Gravity.  Float around and fight your friends in familiar gameplay presented with a twist. Play as astronauts and defeat your enemies for the victory. Created for the 2018 Indie Galactic Space Jam.

Features:

- Full 4-player splitscreen local multiplayer

- Space weapons

- Fully 3D Space station play area

- Zero Gravity 360 degree movement

- No pesky floors

- Push stuff at people
